May 7, 1954
WNYC-FM
Mr. Frank Schooley
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Frank:
I am sending through additional vouchers which are the latest
bills that we have in connection with the Educational Institute
of the Air. The total amount is in excess of what is now in
your account.
Mr. Bernays will be sending you an additional check within the
next day or so to cover all of our outstanding obligations.
I would ask you to pay whatever bills you are able to within the
limits of the funds you now have in the account.
With all best wishes, believe me.
Director
sns-lg
enc.
